title: Minecraft Java版 1.13-pre6 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2018-7-6 18:13 编辑 
预发布版是Minecraft的测试机制，如果该版本作为正式版发布，那么预发布版的游戏文件将与启动器推送的正式版完全相同。
然而，预发布版主要用于服主和Mod制作者的预先体验，如果发现致命漏洞，该预发布版会被新的预发布版代替。因此对于普通玩家建议持观望态度。
Minecraft 1.13 仍未发布，1.13-pre6 为其第48个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



更新内容
Changed dolphin treasure finding behaviour to be more on partiy with Bedrock使海豚寻宝更像基岩版Improved fonts改进字体（译注：部分语言也会显示成像素字体了，当然，没有中文）Some sounds are now more wet一些音效更水了Brought out the bug spray!带来杀虫（bug）剂


漏洞修复
MC-234 - Digging straight down glitches out the breaking animation (Z-fighting)MC-234 - 直接向下挖掘时的破坏动画不正确（Z-fighting）MC-14502 - Special characters on splash text on title screen rendered wrongMC-14502 - 闪烁标语中特定字符渲染错误MC-41410 - Random text does not work in unicodeMC-41410 - 随机文本不在 unicode 模式下起作用MC-64537 - Gui zooming out when using some languages (unicode)MC-64537 - 在unicode 模式下，使用某些语言时 gui 界面缩小MC-72943 - Game freeze after closing an "Open to LAN" single player worldMC-72943 - 在关闭“向局域网开放”的世界时游戏无响应MC-81876 - Number of characters before line cutoff in chat is not same when unicode mode is enabled and when it is offMC-81876 - 聊天栏能容纳的字符在 unicode 模式启用与关闭时不同MC-91727 - loot table "spreading large stacks" will overwrite existing itemsMC-91727 - 战利品表“spreading large stacks”会覆盖已存在的物品MC-92255 - Singleplayer freezes instead of kicking a playerMC-92255 - 单人卡顿，而不是踢出玩家(?)MC-94325 - Shadow of obfuscated text does not match with displayed characterMC-94325 - “混淆”文字的阴影与实际显示的字符不对应MC-96524 - Language specific letters don't look like they shouldMC-96524 - 一些特定的字母看起来不对劲MC-121798 - Can only scroll list in superflat preset selection when it is focusedMC-121798 - 只有在具有焦点时，才能滚动超平坦预设列表MC-121861 - Command argument validation does not work for entity id in /summonMC-121861 - /summon 命令的实体 id 验证不起作用MC-122110 - BufferBuilder not expanding under specific conditions.MC-122110 - BufferBuilder 在特定条件下不扩展MC-122478 - It is possible to create a server in the server list with a blank name and/or IP addressMC-122478 - 可以创建空白名称且/或空白 IP 地址的服务器MC-122495 - Cancelling backup screen using ESC opens main menuMC-122495 - 取消备份屏幕里的使用 ESC 打开主菜单MC-122596 - Command autocomplete overrides command history navigationMC-122596 - 命令自动补全的上下键覆盖了命令历史导航MC-122597 - "Preparing spawn area %s%%" string is hardcoded/not translatableMC-122597 - “Preparing spawn area %s%%” 是硬编码，未翻译MC-123078 - Scoreboard ranges don't work correctly at extreme valuesMC-123078 - 计分板区间极值有误MC-123087 - Fences, glass panes, iron bars, stairs, and melon/pumpkin stems in structures generate with wrong block stateMC-123087 - 栅栏、玻璃板、铁栏杆以及南瓜茎/西瓜茎在结构中以错误的方块状态生成MC-123236 - Wrong error message when using invalid item in /replaceitemMC-123236 - 在 /replaceitem 中使用无效的物品有错误的错误信息MC-123325 - You can no longer use damaged items in advancement icons to display different texturesMC-123325 - 不能在进度图标中使用有耐久的物品显示不同的材质MC-123352 - Interaction error with block and GUI, when shift-clicking them with non-block itemsMC-123352 - 按着 shift 用非方块物品点击方块与 GUI 时交互错误MC-123363 - Occasional crash when changing blocks with a special renderer that uses statesMC-123363 - 当使用特殊的渲染器改变有状态的方块时偶尔崩溃MC-123432 - Snapshots are leaking tile entity data through to world saveMC-123432 - 快照泄露方块实体数据到世界保存(?)MC-124469 - GUI scale size 3 displays as size 2 when Unicode font is forcedMC-124469 - 当强制使用 Unicode 字体时，GUI 缩放大小 3 显示得与缩放大小 2 相同MC-124966 - Torches in mineshafts/strongholds are not always attachedMC-124966 - 废弃矿洞里的火把不附着在墙上MC-125090 - Cartographer doesn't unlock woodland mansion and ocean monument map tradesMC-125090 - 制图师不会解锁林地府邸与海底遗迹的地图交易MC-126244 - Extreme lag when using the /locate command or when generating explorer mapsMC-126244 - /locate 命令与生成探索地图时的卡顿MC-126685 - Bubble columns don't update when placing magma blocks or soul sand above themMC-126685 - 放置岩浆块或灵魂沙在气泡柱上不会让其更新MC-126708 - Advancement trigger "bred_animals" does not trigger for breeding turtlesMC-126708 - 喂养海龟不会触发进度触发器“bred_animals”MC-126769 - Observers detecting updates from redstone on top of themMC-126769 - 观察者顶部的红石使观察者更新MC-127822 - Unicode on/off bug with another languages and english letters.MC-127822 - 使用其他语言和英文字母时的 Unicode 开启/关闭漏洞MC-128387 - Dolphins try to pick up items on landMC-128387 - 海豚尝试捡起陆地上的物品MC-128687 - Picking up lava with an empty bucket would play the water picking up sound.MC-128687 - 用空桶装岩浆会播放装水的音效MC-128736 - Dolphin's pectoral (side) fins are flipped over instead of mirroredMC-128736 - 海豚的胸鳍（侧鳍）被翻转，而不是镜像MC-129318 - The "How Did We Get Here?" advancement does not require Dolphin's GraceMC-129318 - “为什么会变成这样呢？”进度不要求海豚的恩惠MC-130127 - Dolphins generate in large amounts with ocean ruin structuresMC-130127 - 海豚在海底遗迹结构里以巨大数量生成MC-131019 - Setting and changing data of signs creates unnecessary "extra" tags and causes slow downsMC-131019 - 设置与改变告示牌的数据，会产生不必要的“extra”标签并导致卡顿MC-131159 - Dolphins spawning in frozen/deep frozen oceans!MC-131159 - 海豚在深海/冰海生成！MC-131288 - Shulker Box can't be opened and disappears when minedMC-131288 - 不能打开潜影盒，并在开采时消失MC-131783 - Crash on breaking 1.12.2 -> 1.13-pre5 upgraded bannerMC-131783 - 在破坏从 1.12.2 升级到 1.13-pre5 的旗帜时崩溃MC-131903 - Banners not dropping as item when broken after unloadingMC-131903 - 破坏旗帜不会以物品形式掉落MC-132050 - Worlds <= 1.8.9 spam errors on conversionMC-132050 - 低于 1.8.9 的世界转换时的错误MC-132113 - 1.13-pre4+ crashes caused by invalid gamepad / controller configuration detected by LWJGL 3.1.6 build 14bMC-132113 - 1.13-pre4 以上的版本因为由 LWJGL 3.1.6 build 14b 导致的游戏手柄/键盘配置错误而崩溃MC-132242 - Upgrading enderman spawn egg causes chunk to regenerateMC-132242 - 升级末影人的怪物生成蛋导致区块重新生成MC-132252 - Player cannot leave the swimming animation underwaterMC-132252 - 玩家不能在水下取消游泳动画MC-132254 - Using /effect to give players an effect kicks them from the serverMC-132254 - 使用 /effect 给予玩家效果会把他们从服务器踢出MC-132259 - Poor TPS in latest pre-releaseMC-132259 - 在最新的预发布版本中贫穷的很低的 TPSMC-132278 - End Crystal beam is missing textureMC-132278 - 末影水晶缺失材质MC-132281 - Crash while creating a customized superflat world using capital lettersMC-132281 - 使用大写字母创建自定义超平坦世界时崩溃MC-132292 - Some sound events are no longer playing the expected soundMC-132292 - 一些音效事件不再播放预期的音效MC-132311 - Dolphins don't save how long they have been out of waterMC-132311 - 海豚不会存储它们从水里出来多久了MC-132312 - Using bone meal on anything underwater places sea grass on itMC-132312 - 在水下的任何地方使用骨粉会有海草冒出来MC-132320 - Entities with new IDs disappear when upgradingMC-132320 - 有新 ID 的实体会在升级时消失MC-132335 - Shulkers no longer shoot missiles in 1.13-pre5MC-132335 - 潜影贝在 1.13-pre5 不再发射导弹MC-132375 - Upgrading 1.12.2 world to 1.13-pre5 crashes the gameMC-132375 - 升级 1.12.2 的世界到 1.13-pre5 使游戏崩溃MC-132443 - Some advancements are not upgraded from 1.12.2 (to 1.13-pre5+)MC-132443 - 一些进度没有从 1.12.2 升级到 1.13-pre5 以上MC-132448 - Illager and golem statistics are not upgraded properlyMC-132448 - 刌民和傀儡的统计没有合适地升级MC-132455 - Evoker spawn egg disappears when upgrading from 1.12.2MC-132455 - 唤魔者怪物生成蛋在从 1.12.2 升级时消失MC-132579 - Inconsistent fontMC-132579 - 字体不一致



服务器jar下载https://launcher.mojang.com/mc/game/1.13-pre6/server/71a2f9a760f0cbcf09d1eae60eebe1ccbb7ea1db/server.jar


正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft  1.13（水域更新）特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
